author: PTI
title: ECI takes note of how South Korea held polls amid coronavirus outbreak
description: “If the pandemic persists, some modifications of the existing procedures might be required,” Ashok Lavasa said.
content: The Election Commission of India (ECI) has taken note of changes made by South Korea in procedures while holding its parliamentary polls amid the coronavirus outbreak and said it will consider modifications as required and suited to the Indian context whereve… [+2764 chars]
